--- select_singer_with_tableset.sql
SELECT * FROM Singers
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM Singers

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.CompoundQuery{
    end:      53,
    Op:       "UNION",
    Distinct: false,
    List:     []parser.QueryExpr{
      &parser.Select{
        pos:      0,
        end:      21,
        Distinct: false,
        AsStruct: false,
        List:     parser.SelectExprList{
          &parser.SelectExpr{
            pos:  7,
            end:  8,
            Expr: nil,
            Star: true,
            As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
          },
        },
        From: parser.FromItemList{
          &parser.FromItem{
            end:  21,
            Expr: &parser.TableName{
              end:   21,
              Ident: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  14,
                end:  21,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
              Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
              As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
            Method: "",
            Num:    nil,
            Rows:   false,
          },
        },
        Where:   nil,
        GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
        Having:  nil,
        OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
        Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
      },
      &parser.Select{
        pos:      32,
        end:      53,
        Distinct: false,
        AsStruct: false,
        List:     parser.SelectExprList{
          &parser.SelectExpr{
            pos:  39,
            end:  40,
            Expr: nil,
            Star: true,
            As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
          },
        },
        From: parser.FromItemList{
          &parser.FromItem{
            end:  53,
            Expr: &parser.TableName{
              end:   53,
              Ident: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  46,
                end:  53,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
              Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
              As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
            Method: "",
            Num:    nil,
            Rows:   false,
          },
        },
        Where:   nil,
        GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
        Having:  nil,
        OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
        Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
      },
    },
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Singers
